products.title: Roma, Bahia - Vertical Blind
products.description: Both pretty and warm, the roma in bahia is a finely woven filter blind allows light to gently trickle through, whilst providing a blast of country colour wherever it's used. Deftly hanging louvres can be easily tilted and pulled across to open or close the blind, allowing you as much or as little light as you please. Place the bahia in a child's bedroom, where it will match fun wallpapers and furniture in bold primary colours; or create a fresh, vibrant colour scheme in the office, where white walls and medium woods will set it off perfectly.

products.title: Roma, Polar - Vertical Blind
products.description: Not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can be opened and closed swiftly and neatly. Makeover a white bathroom by using it as the perfect canvas for the polar, supplementing it with silver fixtures and fittings; or create a gorgeous cool hue in the guest bedroom, where your visitors will love to wake up to this refreshing shade.

products.title: Roma, Fuscous Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room, easing it in gently without disturbing you. The fuscous grey is miles ahead when it comes to modern style, and will work beautifully with equally trendy yellows and bright pinks, both perfect colour schemes for an up-to-date living room, bedroom, or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Vertical Blind
products.description: There are few hues more uplifting than a gentle, pretty aqua, and that's what roma in aqua haze brings to a room. Light, supple, and tightly woven fabric provides the base for this blind, and hangs beautifully in straight louvres to be opened or closed at your leisure. Awaken to a calm, ocean feel by hanging the aqua haze in your master bedroom, where you can surround it with whites and turquoises; or use in the most contemporary of living or dining rooms, complementing with light woods and soft off-whites.

products.title: Roma, Dawn - Vertical Blind
products.description: Simple and functional, the roma in dawn is ideal for creating privacy without compromising on light. The hardy but lightweight fabric is supple and durable, with a lovely cotton-like feel that emits quality and class in bucketloads. The dawn would look fantastic in the kitchen alongside blacks, whites, and greys for a classic monochrome look; in the dining room amongst bold blues for cool sophistication; or in the home office or bedroom alongside bold reds for a look of atmospheric functionality.

products.title: Roma, Alto - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in alto is a sleek, smooth blind, with a tightly woven fabric and natural beige hue. The strong yet lightweight material makes an effective light filter, allowing just the right amount to trickle through. Contrast against chocolate and mocha browns in the living room, highlighted by gold metallics, for a comfortable colour scheme to relax and unwind in. Or go a little bolder and use the alto to accent deep plum walls, with white and beige accents to complete the look.

products.title: Roma, Scorpion - Vertical Blind
products.description: What better way to bring contemporary style into your home than with the gorgeous, elegant roma scorpion? Hanging neatly in adjustable louvres that can be easily slid across or gently tilted, this blind offers quality fabric as well as chic and panache. The scorpion's cool neutrality works wonderfully as part of the uber-stylish colour scheme of yellow and grey, which can be fashionably complemented with fun chevron patterns and daring stripes.

products.title: Roma, Snuff - Vertical Blind
products.description: Combining light-filtering, easy-to-use functionality with a pretty, hushed purple hue, the roma snuff will make a gorgeous addition to any home. Its lovely mauve shade means that it can provide the perfect accent colour or take centre stage as the feature colour. Blend with deep aubergine purple for a bold, unapologetic look in the master bedroom, combining style and chic with romance and atmosphere; or have it sitting pretty in your downstairs hallway against soft cream walls and the palest of lilacs.

products.title: Roma, Lime - Vertical Blind
products.description: Put simply, the roma lime couldn't be livelier or more refreshing if it tried. Whilst it retains the smooth, tightly woven fabric so typical of the roma range, its bright green shade is much wilder, adding a vibrant colour pop wherever it's placed. Squirt some fruity fun into your kitchen by hanging the lime as a vibrant window feature, coupled with white and light wood accents. Or go for an all-out citrus colour scheme by combining this blind with white walls and orange and lemon accents.

products.title: Roma, Mischka - Vertical Blind
products.description: Light and soothing, the soft off-white of the roma in mischka adds peaceful ambience to any room. This matte, tightly woven blind is supple and easy to use, making it a practical choice as well as a pretty one. Add sanctuary to your home by using the mischka in a neutral colour scheme full of tans, taupes, and creams, gently accented by woods of all colours; this subtle, sophisticated look will work beautifully in a lounge, den, or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one. This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make. Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop.

products.title: Roma, Grey Nickel - Vertical Blind
products.description: The cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be pulled aside or tilted with ease. Offset the grey nickel with sunny yellows, fruity limes, or bright oranges to create a trendy and charming colour scheme. Use these striking colour combinations in a bright home office, a relaxing dining room, or a welcoming spare bedroom.

products.title: Roma, Monza - Vertical Blind
products.description: An effective filter blind, the roma monza gently filters light whilst avoiding dimming out the room completely. Red never goes out of style, being the go-to colour for bold and contemporary looks, so this blind will last through the years, regardless of trends. The strong, striking hue used in the monza will make the perfect window feature for an all-white dining room or grey and charcoal living room.

products.title: Roma, Athens Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: In palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends itself to a coordinating charcoal and dove grey colour scheme, ideal for a home office; or to a palette of deep forest greens and pale greys in the den, complemented by medium, polished woods.

products.title: Roma, Bronco - Vertical Blind
products.description: For natural charm, choose the roma in bronco, a medium taupe fabric with a neat, tightly woven fabric, and excellent light-filtering properties, letting the light through at will, whether open or closed. Select the bronco for a strikingly neutral home office, where you can pair it with pale beiges and soft creams. Or instead, add a tempering shade to a dark brown living room, where you can snuggle up after a long night, and where cosiness and warmth are the words of the day.

products.title: Richmond, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The richmond cameo features a barely-there white base adorned with an array of lightly stitched, feathery curves in the same hue. Its louvres are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy, and hang neatly from their rails. Use the cameo in the bathroom, where privacy is key, and clean, fresh colours look their best. Add a soft aqua or duck egg to provide quick bursts of colour, using the hue for towels, bath mats, and wall art.

products.title: Roma, Rodeo Dust - Vertical Blind
products.description: A contemporary, beige filter blind, the roma in rodeo dust mixes a soft tan hue with a smooth, tightly woven fabric for a modern and streamlined look. Wherever you choose to place this blind, it will add a natural class to the room around it. Pair the rodeo dust with forest greens for an outdoorsy atmosphere in the living room, where this unusual and striking colour scheme will create an unforgettable aesthetic.

products.title: Roma, Natural - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

products.title: Rochester, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The clean white of the cameo, from the arch-patterned rochester range, will work in almost any setting. The heavy curves of the patterning are streamlined and fresh, working wonderfully with the straight lines of the vertically hanging louvres. Use the cameo to add soft texture to an all-white kitchen, plumping for sleek, contemporary white units and glossy tiles. Include furniture in light to medium woods, or even modern whites, and choose silver for the fixtures, fittings, and oddments.

products.title: Richmond, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

products.title: Decor, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

products.title: Henderson, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

products.title: Rochester, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a sophisticated window dressing, opt for the elegant rochester in cream, where fine, silky threads shape a quality and beneficial blind with a captivating texture. This exquisite cloth, with both beauty and grace, hangs on adjustable louvres that allow you to alter the amount of light entering the room. Generate an elegant boudoir by including the dreamy texture of the cream amongst alike, opulent fabrics with similar shimmer and style.

products.title: Rochester, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

products.title: Roma, Gallery - Vertical Blind
products.description: Calm and collected, the roma gallery's pale cream hue will set off bolder colours with ease, making it both a pretty and useful window feature. The pale colour shows off the supple, cotton-like fabric that is finely woven yet highly durable. Construct a serene, peaceful environment by using the gallery as the key colour rather than a complementary one, and place against matching cream walls and soft furnishings, with light woods working effectively as an accent; a look that will work beautifully in a master bedroom or living room.

products.title: Henderson, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: The antique-style stripes of the henderson are this time in the soothing off-white of the cameo, with alternate stitching patterns forming the striping pattern, which complements the clean lines of the modern louvres. Choose the cameo as part of the nursery, where the sweet stripes will add interest to the room without complicating the decor. Match with a soft lemon yellow for a soothing palette to encourage calm and tranquility, whilst still giving off a happy and cheery vibe.

products.title: Roma, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

products.title: Henderson, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accentuating that of the stripes. For a luxe and classic look in the master bedroom, settle the cream against matching cream walls and furnish with dark, polished woods to give a contrasting effect.

products.title: Richmond, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet sturdy enough to hang neatly in louvres, this is a blind with both practical and stylish qualities. Team the cream with a bolder hue for maximum impact, choosing a deep maroon or burgundy for a grand look in the dining room.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in ths modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.description: For graceful style with captivating decoration, choose the dcor in cameo where textured fibres fuse to produce an elegant creamy blind with distinctive, crescent detailing and compelling texture. products.title: Arcadia Porcelain Vertical Blind
products.description: If you want to keep your window area simple and streamlined, then the arcadia porcelain vertical blind is a fantastic choice, with rigid pvc vanes and no chains. products.title: Burlington, Waterfall - Vertical Blind
products.description: In a gorgeous shade of baby blue, the burlington waterfall is reminiscent of blue summer sky, and the gently curved lines of the patterning, with its intricate and varied stitching, only add to the blind's dreamy effect. Give a nursery a sweet and subtle pop of colour by including the waterfall in the window. The colour is soft enough to help craft a calming ambience in the room whilst simultaneously bringing life and colour the scheme.

products.title: Burlington, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: A pretty, yellowy tone, the burlington in cream is a homely blind with a somewhat traditional look and feel. Well-stitched curves adorn this high quality blind, and the sleek louvres offer a contemporary edge to an otherwise classic fabric. Give the cream a home amidst fellow creams, oatmeals, and fawns, where it will sit pretty in this field of neutrals. This light look will give a living room or dining room a feeling of spaciousness and light, and can be easily accented with brushed golds or bronzes.

products.title: Burlington, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: Intended to catch the eye, the burlington in cameo hosts a collection of beguiling textures in a brilliant, classy white, and a distinctive arrangement. Containing refined, satin-like threads to generate an engaging blind, it offers modern, adaptable louvres to suit your shading and privacy preferences. For a sleek and stylish dcor scheme in your dining area, coordinate the cameo with similar, satiny textures, such as silky napkins and a glossy table runner.

products.title: Richmond (Blackout), Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: A powerful blackout blind, the richmond (blackout) in cameo offers unbeatable protection from outside lights, whether from street lamps, traffic, or the sun itself. The hardwearing fabric displays beautifully stitched curved lines, slightly raised from the surface for intrigue and depth. In an all-white bathroom, hang the cameo to give complete light protection and privacy when you need it. Stick to white walls and tiling, complementing this cool look occasionally with a sweet sky blue, using it in your towels and bath mats.

products.title: Burlington, Shadow - Vertical Blind
products.description: In a soft dove grey, the burlington shadow offers subtle style, with its solid, strong fabric and pretty abstract patterning. The vertical sheets hang neatly, able to be pulled across or tilted according to your light and privacy needs. Use the shadow as part of a grey and white colour scheme, which gives understated style and a fresh, airy look, perfect for a guest bedroom or home office. Go for clean, contemporary furniture to keep the feel modern and welcoming.

products.title: Grande, Shadow - Vertical Blind
products.description: Fashion an elegant dcor scheme with the grande shadow, where exquisite silky threads merge to parade a creative and captivating display of textured waves. This attractive blind also flaunts a calming, seafoam hue with a contemporary grey tinge. It is perfectly suited to many surroundings, and furthermore, contains adjustable slats to allow the desired amount of ventilation and privacy. Create a sophisticated dining area by matching the shadow with a soothing colour palette of whites, olives, and avocados.

products.title: Grande, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: On a classic creamy canvas, the grande in cream features a wave-like patterning that adds depth and intrigue to the blind. The adjustable slats provide versatile light entry and easy ventilation, as well as giving any window a sleek and modern aesthetic. Set the cream against a teal feature wall in the living room, where the light colouring will offset the green-blue shade perfectly. Add slate greys throughout the room to add an extra dimension, as well as to tame the brightness of the teal.

products.title: Richmond (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep out the night-time light with the quality richmond (blackout) in pure; mixing practicality with style, this blind will help you to get the best night's sleep possible. And as if that wasn't enough, it also features adjustable louvres, which allow you to alter the light entering the room. Feature the pure in your master bedroom to benefit from its blackout function, and to create a sophisticated decor theme with alluring qualities.

products.title: Lusso, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The lusso pure features a distinct and enthralling texture that is sure to catch your eye and create a sophisticated scheme. This modest blind presents a soothing white shade that will blend perfectly into any scheme, whilst also featuring adjustable louvres which allow you versatile light control. Complement the pure with a frame of sumptuous linens in deep aubergine or soothing cornflower blue to create a contrasting casing to help to boost both the texture and brilliance of the blind.

products.title: Milano, Mantis - Vertical Blind
products.description: In sweet minty green, the milano's mantis is a delicately decorative piece, offering a smoothly stitched canvas adorned with attractively curved lines in contrasting stitching. The colour is a cool hue that provides a pretty hit of colour without overpowering the room. Why not opt for the calming influence of the mantis in the nursery? It will look simply stunning against tranquil off-whites and soothing greys, and can easily be mixed with cute animal patterns, polka dots, and stripes.

products.title: Meadow Lark Natural 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Light and bright, the meadow lark vertical blind is ideal for enhancing a minimalist interior. The grey and white hues of the fabric are simple and versatile and will look sleek and clean at your windows, whilst the pretty wildflower design adds a touch of traditional charm. products.title: Edwin Dove Grey Vertical Blind

The quality and soft, textured and with a surprising warmth for such a sharp, stylish grey, this fabric looks and feels gorgeous.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Raven - Vertical Blind
products.description: A striking metallic setting the backdrop for cracked black patterning, the ajanta (blackout) raven is truly a sight to behold, and will set the mood for any room. Despite its dark hue, this blind remains efficient for light control, with adjustable louvres for you to move to your liking. Use as part of a moody, gothic dining room scheme, with greys and silvers to offset it. Or perhaps it might suit a teenager's bedroom, where they can maintain privacy whilst giving their room style and substance.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: A dark, mature cream, the ajanta (blackout) in cream is a stylish, neutral, and practical blind. White crackle patterning doesn't detract from the gentle shimmer of the fabric, and its easiness to clean and adjustable louvres make this a functional option. For freshness and vitality, with a hint of subtle sophistication, settle the cream in amongst duck egg blue units and country wooden worktops in the kitchen.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Crimson - Vertical Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) crimson is far from shy and retiring, and will make a statement in any room it's used. Wipe-clean, fully adjustable, and durable louvres mean that this is a blind that will stand the test of time - both in use and in style. Kids will love having this brightly coloured blind added to their bedroom or playroom, where it will complement a wide range of fun, patterned wallpapers.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Riptide - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in riptide features a lightweight, malleable fabric and a gorgeously cool, icy shade of blue. Adjustable louvres protect you from light disturbances and excess heat as and when you need it; simply tilt or move aside as you please. Group with bright whites and the subtlest of silvers in a modern, calming home office or dining room, where light woods will suit it best. Or insert some subtle colour into your hallway or landing, without overpowering any existing dcor choices.

products.title: Affinity, Touch - Vertical Blind
products.description: The affinity touch is close to pure white, but without the stark brightness, and has a pretty scattered patterning over the top. This simple and attractive blind is made from an enduring, textured fabric, and offers effective light-filtering properties to allow the light in whilst offering privacy. Use in the bedroom for a romantic, wistful feel, without compromising on contemporary design. Surround with dusky pinks or muted greens for country, summery look all year round, and accessorise with brushed golds and cast iron furniture.

products.title: Tiffany, Smoulder - Vertical Blind
products.description: The tiffany smoulder's dark charcoal shade is the height of style, with its softly curving pattern and lightweight yet durable fabric, and offers a modern, up-to-date style that just can't be outdone. Use it for privacy, gently tilting the louvres when you'd like more light. Use in a modern dining room, set against white walls and pale soft furnishings, with the occasional silver or red accessory to add a pop of colour.

products.title: Affinity, Silver - Vertical Blind
products.description: Affinity's silver combines a shimmering fabric background with raised, pretty patterning to craft a pretty yet unobtrusive filter blind. A robust vertical blind, the neatly hanging louvres will work effortlessly open and close on demand. The silver can sit as a soft window feature against white walls and light woods to create a modern take on traditional styling in a living room or bedroom. Or use it with dark greys and silver accessories for a cool, one-of-a-kind look in your bathroom or hallway.

products.title: Tiffany, Flawless - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sophisticated and calming, the soft white of the tiffany flawless is an understated way of adding pattern and texture to a window. This soothing blind is deceptively robust, despite its light appearance, and slides easily along the rail when the louvres are tilted or moved. The flawless will indeed look flawless amongst soft greys and cool silvers in a bedroom or home office; or sit amongst icy blues, baby pinks, or soft lilacs for a pretty, romantic appearance in a master bedroom or guest room.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Code - Vertical Blind
products.description: Rapture (blackout)'s code captures dreamy taupe with dove grey and shimmering silver accents, resulting in an attractive, contemporary blind that will blend in effortlessly with existing dcor choices. Don't forget that their vertical blinds have easily adjustable louvres that can be tilted back and forth to allow in as much or as little light as you wish. Complement slate greys or rich browns by using the code in the kitchen for a window covering that is both stylish and convenient.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Pewter - Vertical Blind
products.description: In soft slate grey, the roma (fr) in pewter is a versatile neutral that can be used to match a wide range of decor styles. The flawless fabric is flame-retardant, making it an ideal choice for a commercial property, and hangs in orderly louvres for a tidy and streamlined aesthetic. Tame pillar-box reds, jet blacks, and stark whites by adding the softness of the pewter to the mix. Stick to white walls to maintain a feeling of light and space, and use block colour items for clean lines and hard edges, forming a highly contemporary look.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Ebony - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in ebony is the deepest, darkest black, which will make it a strong contender for attention in your room. Its blackout properties, manoeuvrable louvres, and smooth, high quality fabric just serve to add to the appeal of this sleek window covering. Accentuate lime green or orange shades in a teen's bedroom or your home office by settling the ebony amongst them to craft a monochromatic colour scheme with a colour-popping twist.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a combination of iridescent style and practical usability, make the splash (blackout) in pure your blind of choice. The glimmering sheen will add life and sparkle to your windows, and the manoeuvrable louvres allow you to adjust the light to your liking. In an area where you need surfaces and furnishings that are easy to clean, such as the kitchen or family dining area, there's no better option than the pure.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Palace - Vertical Blind
products.description: Palermo (blackout)'s palace is a dark, royal blue on a slick, durable fabric. Movable louvres mean that you can make your room as dark or as light as you like, not restricting you to the deep shade of the blue twenty-four-seven. Make the palace stand out by placing in a kitchen or bathroom with white tiling and units, and give the room a cool, understated look with added silvers. Alternatively, go bright and bold by accenting with bright yellows or oranges in a bedroom or lounge.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Spun Pearl - Vertical Blind
products.description: Origin (blackout)'s spun pearl is a strong and vivid shade of grey that will work hard to offset other, brighter colours. The simple, smooth texture of the fabric creates easily movable louvres, which can be adjusted at will to allow as much or as little light in as you like. Use in a chic, contemporary home office with plenty of whites or creams, and the occasional hint of silver every now and again.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Blush - Vertical Blind
products.description: Pink and pretty, the palermo (blackout) blush blends a gorgeously pale hue with strength and durability. The lightly textured fabric reflects the light beautifully, and the tilting louvres can be adjusted and clean with ease, making for a practical yet attractive window covering. Brighten up a contemporary home office by adding the blush to off-white walls and luxurious soft furnishings; or instead, make a child very happy by painting their bedroom a matching shade of pink to give the room a lovely, rosy glow.

products.title: Affinity, Storm - Vertical Blind
products.description: The muted grey of the affinity storm is offset by the raised stitched pattern that covers the blind from head to toe. This pretty blind does little to give away the resilience of its high quality fabric, yet it is nonetheless durable and long-lasting. The storm would suit a fresh, contemporary dining room, in combination with white walls and glass furniture, and would work brilliantly as an attractive window feature in an otherwise plain downstairs cloakroom, hallway, or utility room.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Latte - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a window covering with delectable shading and contemporary style, elect the modest roma (fr) in latte, which hosts a creamy, coffee shade on an ample, crease-free cloth. With modern effect and graceful elegance, this classy fabric sits in adaptable slats that allow you to manually regulate the amount of light and breeze entering the room. Fashion a sophisticated living space by coordinating the latte with a flattering cream surrounding, adding accenting colour with plenty of coffee-toned fabrics and conker-hued furnishings.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Slate - Vertical Blind
products.description: The sarra (blackout) in slate unites a sophisticated light texturing with a utilitarian slate grey to craft a stylish blackout blind that wins in both practicality and versatility. When closed, this blind will keep sunlight, street lights, and car lights well and truly out, so that you can be totally interrupted. If you can't resist a monochromatic colour scheme, then the slate could be for you. Use it in the kitchen as part of an industrial look, set against blacks and whites, or let this be a central feature in a teenager's bedroom for a versatile window covering that will match most colours.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Crimson - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) in crimson displays a delightfully cheerful poppy red, making it a bold and vibrant choice for any room. It has added practicality, as well as style, with its neat, easily adjustable louvres for maintaining your desired levels of light, air, and privacy. Craft an unconventional colour scheme in your bathroom by melding the crimson with a white base in terms of tiling, wall paint, and suite.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: On a shimmering, off-white backdrop, the ajanta (blackout) pure features a cracked white patterning that catches in the light as the blind moves. With a durable, wipe-clean surface, this blind satisfies your need for function and practicality, as well as looking attractive and fresh. For a classic bathroom colour scheme, set the pure against blues and silvers, whether in the detail of the tiling, the colour of the towels, or the style of your sink fittings.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Palace - Vertical Blind
products.description: A dark, but not quite navy, blue, the sarra (blackout) palace blind will add style, depth of colour, and elegance to any room, whilst still maintaining a useful practicality via its effective blackout qualities and wipe-clean surface. If you love to bring the night sky in, use in a bedroom amongst silvers and whites to create a midnight feel all day long. Or use as part of a naval colour scheme in the kitchen by offsetting with whites and reds, for a stylish and timeless look.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerise - Vertical Blind
products.description: Pretty in hot, striking pink, the palermo (blackout) in cerise is a bold, funky choice that will have an instant impact when you walk into the room. This blind is gently textured, so the light bounces off it prettily as it hits it. Perfect for a child's bedroom, amongst paler baby pinks and soft whites, the cerise is best accessorised with shiny silvers and white furniture. Or go ultra-modern, and team with blacks and slates to really make a statement in a teenager's room or contemporary dining room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Zest - Vertical Blind
products.description: Gorgeous apple green and gently raised texturing meet in the palermo (blackout) zest, an easily manoeuvrable blind that allows you to maintain colour, brightness, and privacy, whilst keeping the outside light at bay. Brighten up a tan or beige kitchen colour scheme by planting the zest as a key feature, bringing your existing dcor to life; or use in the kids' playroom to match playful wallpaper and bright, fun furniture - it doesn't even matter if it clashes, as that's half the fun.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Azure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The azure features a bold cobalt blue that will draw the eye to the window and give a cheery, spring-summer look. It is a member of the roma (fr) range, a flame-retardant collection perfect for commercial properties, yet also stylish enough to use in the home. Transform a boring playroom into a child's haven by including the azure in a bright and colourful decor scheme, teaming it with other primary and secondary colours for a fun and vibrant setting.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cotton - Vertical Blind
products.description: A delicate shade of white, the palermo (blackout) in cotton is a refreshing and energising blind that will help you maintain a light and airy feel even when you need the blind closed. The durability of the fabric transfers to the opening and closing mechanism of the firm, neat louvres, giving you complete control. Use the cotton to create a blank canvas in a bathroom or utility room, and adorn with floral accessories and country colours.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Somehow daring and discreet at the same time, the rapture (blackout) in pure combines an ice white background with flits of grey and dashes of barely-there silver, resulting in a gorgeous vertical blind that twinkles in the sunlight. products.title: Tiffany, Dove - Vertical Blind

Otherwise, sit against taupe walls and pale green accents for an irresistible kitchen colour scheme, or to create a relaxed feel in your home office.

products.title: Affinity, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The leaf-like patterning of the affinity pure will light up a room's dcor and you'll be sure to notice it catching the light. Go cool and fresh in the kitchen by setting the pure against sky blue walls and light, natural woods. products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Putty - Vertical Blind
products.description: The perfect cream shade, the sarra (blackout) in putty offers neutral elegance and can be blended with all kinds of colours. products.title: Origin (Blackout), Snow - Vertical Blind

products.description: The soft neutrality of the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings to mind rich dessert cream, and its fine, smooth surface is soft to the touch. This blind is perfect for adding a touch of colour to your home, the f believe it or not, the first thing that popped into their minds when setting their eyes on this fabric was the beautiful patterns and fruity vibes of ripple ice-cream, and these tones ooze through this design.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Code - Vertical Blind
products.description: The deep cream of the capri (blackout) code serves to provide a shimmering neutral backdrop to other, more attention-grabbing dcor. Its gentle, wispy curves are barely visible, catching you by surprise as the light hits them. This pretty pale beige will work well in any room of the house, due to its fantastic flexibility. Try it in the kitchen, where its wipe-clean surface will come in handy, and blend with mocha browns, dusky blues, or stark whites, depending on the mood you're looking for.

products.title: Affinity, Plaster - Vertical Blind
products.description: Affinity's plaster is warm and welcoming, and creates a homely, classic feel in any room, whilst maintaining a feeling of contemporary, modern-day style. Its louvre's tilting mechanism is simple and easy to use, so that can let light in or keep it out as you see fit. The plaster will sit pretty amidst dark browns and medium woods, whether in the living room, bedroom, hallway, or anywhere else you would like a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The delicate silver curve pattern of the capri (blackout) pure tempers the bright white that lies beneath, and catches the light at every turn. Adjust the louvres to control the light to your liking, and enjoy this practical yet visually pleasing vertical blind. By hanging in the kitchen, you get attractive simplicity combined with wipe-clean practicality, as well as a blank canvas against which to sit the rest of your dcor.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), White - Vertical Blind
products.description: Brilliant white shades are the most malleable of all, and that's the beauty of the palermo (blackout) in white. Adjustable louvres, that are easily cleaned, allow you to control how much light and privacy you have in your home, whilst allowing the light to bounce off them. Make a bold red stand out even more, or a forest green really come to life, by placing the white amongst them. Wonderfully suited to a bathroom or kitchen environment, where freshness and clean hues are everything, this blind can take part in almost any colour scheme.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Burgundy - Vertical Blind
products.description: The gorgeously rich hue of the palermo (blackout) in burgundy adds a boldness to a room without compromising on classic, traditional style. Allow the light in whilst maintaining an element of privacy by gently tilting the adjustable louvres to your liking. Make the burgundy stand out in the living room by placing it against white or cream walls, and using matching burgundy accents throughout the room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerulean - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pretty duskiness of the palermo (blackout) in cerulean is a shade of blue that isn't to be missed, and when combined with the smooth, textured practicality of its lightly textured fabric, this blind becomes simply irresistible. Settle the cerulean amongst pale greys and whites, for a clean and attractive look in the kitchen, dining room, or living room. Accent with silver picture frames and ornaments, and don't forget to match your fixtures and fittings for maximum impact - you certainly won't regret the extra effort.

products.title: Affinity, Black - Vertical Blind
products.description: The blackest of blacks, the affinity black is a bold and contemporary choice of blind, yet with a traditional scattered pattern sitting gently on top. This is a blind that exists only to stand up and be noticed, and there is certainly no missing it. Design a monochrome home office space by making the black its central feature, and surrounding it with stark whites and cool greys. Add a splash of colour if you like, using bright citrus shades, a bold red, or creamy pastels.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Chiffon - Vertical Blind
products.description: The capri (blackout) in chiffon offers a rich cream backdrop to delicately glistening curves, all on a durable, wipe-clean purposes, for when practicality is just as important as looks. Adjust the louvres for flexible light control, or draw back altogether as required. Use the chiffon in the kitchen amongst soft cappuccinos and pretty creams, or hang in the home office where you can pair with duck egg blues and cream soft furnishings, for a relaxing work environment that you won't want to leave.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Bluebell - Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft, lilac-tinted blue of the palermo (blackout) bluebell will raise plenty of questions and get the whole family talking. Is it blue? Or is it dark lilac? It doesn't matter because this shade is so unique and pretty, you'll want it in your home regardless. For maximum impact, set the bluebell against pure white walls and complement with matching accessories throughout the room. Whether you're hoping for summery beauty in the kitchen, a pretty feature colour for a child's bedroom, or something to stand out in your hallway, the bluebell is a must-have.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Rocket - Vertical Blind
products.description: A deep brick red hue and discreet raised patterning come together in the sarra (blackout) rocket to create a modern and stylish blackout blind. Loud and proud, this is a powerful blackout blind that sets itself apart from its surrounding dcor. Sit the rocket amongst bright whites to create an unusual and eye-catching colour scheme in the bathroom, or use in a child's bedroom or playroom to add fun and colour to the mix.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Whisper - Vertical Blind
products.description: The creamy, off-white rapture (blackout) in whisper blends a soft, subtle background with a gently shimmering pattern that sits naturally over the top. Adjust how much light enters your room by controlling the louvres to your liking, and never be left in the dark - or light - again. A neat addition to a light-coloured utility room or downstairs cloakroom, where space enhancement is a must, the whisper will hang perfectly in your window.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Don't be fooled by the pale, dainty shade of the palermo (blackout) in cream, as this is a durable, sturdy blind that will last you for years. With adjustable louvres, this blind allows you to control the light easily, and you'll enjoy the way the light bounces off the sheen of the fabric. Versatile by nature, the cream will go with almost any colour scheme you have in mind, making it the perfect choice for rooms such as the bathroom or kitchen, where you can keep the overall shades the same, whilst changing out bold accents as the mood takes you.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Code - Vertical Blind
products.description: Glistening patterning on a pale beige background takes centre stage on the splash (blackout) blind in code, whilst its adjustable louvres and wipe-clean surface add functionality and common sense, making for the perfect mixture of head and heart. For a clean and relaxing look in your home office, group with cappuccino browns and heavy creams, to provide luxury and elegance without going over the top.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: Cream coloured, with a gently textured satin finish, the palermo (blackout) cameo is a neutral blind that will fit almost anywhere in your home. Adjustable louvres are used to control the light, which will bounce off the blind's gentle sheen and reflect into your room. Go for gold in the living room by teaming the cameo with brushed gold metallics and soft cappuccino shades, resulting in calming, luxurious atmosphere that neither you and your family nor your guests will be able to resist.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Black - Vertical Blind
products.description: In terms of home dcor, the colour black often gets misunderstood. Yet, far from being moody or gothic in nature, the palermo (blackout) black makes a wonderful complementary accent to other, brighter shades, whilst still retaining the brilliant practicality that is so typical of the palermo range. Accent bold brights in the kitchen, such as yellows or limes, with the darkness of the black, or set up a wholly monochromatic scheme in the home office by teaming with pure, bright whites and pale dove greys, letting the blind be your room's dominant feature.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Icecap - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sarra (blackout)'s icecap is a pure white, finely textured blind, with excellent blackout properties, so that you can keep the light and heat out as and when you need to. The brightness of the white offers a stark contrast to almost any shade, adding a refreshing cleanness wherever it's hung. For a crisp, clean home office, pair the icecap with bright limes and yellows to create a lively, eye-catching colour scheme, or with pale pastel blues or pinks for a calming serenity that's sure to help you concentrate.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Light Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: A soft dove grey forms the basis for the palermo (blackout) light grey, gently accented by the light-reflecting, gentle texturing. For a blind that will go with almost any dcor and will last year upon year, this could be the option for you. Team the light grey with bold reds or forest greens that need tempering by a more neutral shade, forming a gorgeous colour combination in a bedroom or den. Grey can still be cosy, so don't be fooled by its cool demeanour; paired with the right colours, this blind can help you to create a warm and welcoming home.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Midnight - Vertical Blind
products.description: It's all in the name; the palermo (blackout) in midnight is a deep, night-time blue that provides a dark, mysterious atmosphere. products.title: Anthology, Abyss - Vertical Blind
products.description: The light, natural brown of the anthology in abyss makes for a blind that is truly fit for purpose, with a supple, woven fabric that will pull its weight amongst all kinds of colour schemes and dcor styles. This pretty country fabric blend perfectly in a rustic setting, such as a living room filled with hessians, natural woods, and shabby chic furniture. Alternatively, use in the bathroom amidst bright turquoises or lively greens to create a gorgeous colour scheme that you won't want to walk out of.

products.title: Anthology, Moonstone - Vertical Blind
products.description: The purposeful style of the anthology in moonstone provides the best of both worlds with its gorgeous, woven texture and natural beige hue. The light, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and hangs in neat louvres for easy workability. The traditional room for such a natural material might be the kitchen, where it will undeniably look fantastic amongst hessian fabrics and woven wicker, but why not couple the moonstone with deep chocolate browns in a country living room instead? With this versatile fabric, you'll never run out of options.

products.title: Anthology, Cobra - Vertical Blind
products.description: The anthology in cobra combines a rich brown colour with a lightweight woven fabric, cut into streamlined louvres that hang neatly from the rail and can be easily tilted or moved to change the light content of the room as you please. The natural look and feel of the cobra makes it ideal to hang above a workstation in a tranquil office, where light and air is an absolute must. Otherwise, try it in the kitchen to create a traditionally country feel, set against forest greens and rich terracottas.

products.title: Apollo, Endeavour - Vertical Blind
products.description: The apollo in endeavour features a lightweight, pliable fabric in rich, cream shade, with lightly textured patterning dusted over the top. Adjustable louvres can be easily tilted or moved to protect you and your room from light disturbances and excess heat as and when you please. Combine the endeavour with deep forest greens or rich terracottas for an outdoorsy look in the kitchen or dining room, where medium woods will fit best.

products.title: Apollo, Aspire - Vertical Blind
products.description: The apollo in aspire is a calming, natural-coloured vertical blind, made from a lightweight, yet robust, high quality fabric whose neatly hanging louvres keep the light and the heat out as and when you need them to. Sit the aspire amongst gentle country greens, dusky blues, or muted pinks for a lovely, cosy feeling in your living room or kitchen. Accessorise with hessian fabrics, wicker furniture, and rustic woods, for a truly shabby chic style that is so on trend right now.

products.title: Bari Spc, Merino - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a traditional yet modern window display, opt for the bari spc merino, a contemporary blind with adjustable louvres. This practical feature allows you to move the slats accordingly, filtering the desired amount of light and breeze. And if that wasn't enough, this quality fabric also carries a solar protective coating that repels the suns heat without affecting the fabric. Use the merino in your master bedroom to form a sophisticated colour scheme.

products.title: Bari Spc, Astra - Vertical Blind
products.description: With its tilting louvres, which allow you to control the room's levels of light, ventilation, and privacy, and its solar protective coating to reflect the sun's rays, the bari spc astra is nothing if not practical. Add to this its rich, creamy tone, and you have a blind that is both functional and packed full of style. Complement a rustic country kitchen by including the astra amongst organic shades of apple green, terracotta, and sky blue.

products.title: Bari Spc, Coconut - Vertical Blind
products.description: The milky coconut brings a warm, neutral cream tone, with a fresh and clean aesthetic, to the lightly textured bari spc collection. Sitting neatly in vertical slats, the fabric is lightweight yet durable, offering a modern look and feel. Dabble in an all-white colour scheme in the living room by combining the coconut with varying shades of white and cream, using these soft tones for everything from walls and floors to furniture and ornaments.

products.title: Bari Spc, Mischka - Vertical Blind
products.description: The mischka, from the bari spc range, displays the palest of greys, adorned with fine stitching and gentle ribbing. Practical as ever, this spc blind reflects the sun's harsh rays, allowing you a controlled and even temperature no matter the time of year. For true contemporary chic, match the mischka with mustard yellows and darker slate greys, using the blind as a tempering accent to a bold colour scheme.

products.title: Bari Spc, Governor Bay - Vertical Blind
products.description: Displaying a bold, luscious petrol blue, the governor bay stems from the bari spc collection, a range of practical blinds with a useful sun protective coating to reflect strong, warming rays, helping you to prevent your home from overheating in the summer. Go all out blue in the bathroom by hanging the governor bay amidst a white suite and pale blue walls. Choose vintage-inspired blue and white patterned tiles, accenting the look with antique finds and naked, unfinished woods.

products.title: Bari Spc, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Appropriately named, the bari spc in pure displays a beautifully clean, lily white hue that serves as the perfect canvas for the lightly stitched texturing of the thick yet papery fabric. The adjustable louvres hang in an orderly fashion to convey a neat and contemporary aesthetic. Craft a refreshingly airy atmosphere in the master bedroom by combining the pure with matching white walls and bedlinen, opting for polished wooden floorboards and light wood furniture.

products.title: Bari Spc, Rhino - Vertical Blind
products.description: The beautiful midnight blue of the rhino gives a dreamy edge to this contemporary bari spc blind. Adorned with fine stitching in a matching blue, the fabric is sturdy and durable yet with a soft, paper-like texture. Complement the rhino with shimmering silvers for a modern, streamlined look in a teenager's bedroom. Choose white or pale grey paint for the walls, and match bedlinen to the deep blue of the blind.

products.title: Bari Spc, Cararra - Vertical Blind
products.description: A pretty shade of cream, the bari spc in cararra offers all of the practicality of its range along with a subtle sense of style. As well as the multifaceted functionality of the adjustable louvres, the fabric is backed with a solar protective coating to reflect unwanted sunlight, keeping overly warm temperatures at bay. The cararra is the ideal choice for taming bolder tones of plum or aubergine, making for a beautifully striking scheme.

products.title: Bari Spc, Tuscany - Vertical Blind
products.description: The deep, mature red of the tuscany brings a sophisticated yet country vibe to the ever practical bari spc range. Fully adjustable louvres hang neatly from the rail, providing a sleek and modern edge to this otherwise traditional blind. Match the dark red tuscany with soft, country creams for a contemporary take on country style. Go for wooden floors and cream walls, using a similar shade of red for additions such as throws and cushions.

products.title: Bari Spc, Manatee - Vertical Blind
products.description: In sleek slate grey, the bari spc in manatee offers a contemporary and clean aesthetic, complemented by barely-there stitching to provide texture and depth. Its solar protective coating gives this blind additional practicality by reflecting the sun's rays to keep the room nice and cool. Accent the manatee with a vibrant lime green in your home office to bring the grey tone to life. Opt for metallic, modern furniture for a hint of industrial style, going for unfinished wooden flooring and matching lime oddments.

products.title: Bari Spc, Sienna - Vertical Blind
products.description: The 'peaches 'n' cream' tone of the bari spc's sienna is as sweet as they come, displaying a pale, pinky peach hue with a somewhat vintage feel. The design of the blind itself, however, is sleek and contemporary, with a modern fabric hanging neatly in streamlined vertical slats. For pretty sophistication in an older child's, pair the sienna with a gentle cream hue, keeping the same, barely-there tones throughout the room.

products.title: Bari Spc, Perano - Vertical Blind
products.description: The sweet sky blue of the bari spc perano offers a cheery, summery hue, not contradicted by the clean, papery feel of the fabric, which is tough and durable. The neatly hanging louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light, air, and privacy. Give your kitchen a happy-go-lucky lift by settling the perano in amongst white units and tiles. By adding a sunshine yellow and plenty of light, rustic woods, you can achieve a contemporary country look sure to put a smile on your face during mealtimes.

products.title: Sacramento Magnolia Vertical Blind
products.description: Here you can enjoy soft cream colour, beautiful fabric like texture and heaps of practical benefits too. Your window will be dressed in practical style with the sacramento magnolia vertical blind, we promise. This vertical blind is completely up to date, working a fa here you can enjoy soft cream colour, beautiful fabric like texture and heaps of practical benefits too.
